Text.Page:
Look, we can hold here until the bloodtusks come home, but there's no way I can complete my mission with this ragtag groupâ€”not with so many argon mutations patrolling nearby.

If you can take out some syndrene dragoons and zariik cyclopses around here, we might stand a chance. Help us help you.

I appreciate you risking your neck for us, . Thanks.

I'll see you in Peril Cavern...if I live to reach it.
